Name: Strange Investigations: Two for Solitaire Collector's Edition
About the game: The first sequel in this intriguing new detective series is back with Strange Investigations: Two for Solitaire! With their first case behind them, you’d think Dana and Malcolm would be ready for a vacation, but instead, they’re itching for a new case to crack. Unfortunately, they soon get more than they bargained for when they stumble upon something so sinister that it will bring the danger right to their door! Join Dana on a case you won’t soon forget as you navigate the twist and turns of a crime committed by a disordered mind in this exciting Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure game! This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won’t find in the standard version! The Collector’s Edition includes: • Find a hidden inheritance in the bonus game! • Replay your favorite HOPs and mini-games to earn achievements! • Complete jigsaw puzzles and unlock a secret room! • Enjoy exclusive wallpapers and music! • Unravel the mystery with the help of an official strategy guide!
